Resistance.help: Body armor gives this Spec Ops Soldier resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He can fire a Burst, Heavy Burst and Web Grenade from his SCAR Rifle.

Brawl.help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

SCAR_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Advanced Submachine Gun.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

SCAR_Heavy_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Advanced Submachine Gun.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Web_Grenade.help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
Web_Grenade.targetHelp: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.
Web_Grenade.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} entangling you!

Rifle_Butt.help: You have been Disoriented with a Rifle butt.
Rifle_Butt.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented with a Rifle butt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Flash_Bang.help: The Flash Bang Grenade has exploded near you. You feel Disoriented and cannot focus. Your chance to hit and Perception have been reduced.
Flash_Bang.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} hits {PlayerDest} with a {PowerName} disorienting them, reducing their chance to hit and lowering their perception.
Flash_Bang.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} disorienting you reducing your chance to hit and lowering your perception.

Equip.help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Equipped. He can now fire a Flash-Bang Grenade from his SCAR Rifle to Disorient foes. He can also Disorient foes with a Rifle Butt.

SCAR_Snipe.help: The SpecOps Combat assault rifle, or SCAR, can be used as a Sniper Rifle to take out a target at extreme range.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Tear_Gas.help: The Tear Gas is making you choke. Your Damage is Debuffed.
Tear_Gas.targetHelp: The Tear Gas is making you choke. Your Damage is Debuffed.
Tear_Gas.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} hits {PlayerDest} with their {PowerName} reducing their damage and causes them to choke!
Tear_Gas.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} reducing your damage and causing you to choke!

Stealth.help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense from melee and ranged attacks. If, however, you attack while using this power, you will be discovered and will lose your Stealth and some of your Defense bonus. Stealth will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Very low Endurance cost.

Tactical_Upgrade.help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Tactically Upgraded. He can now fire a Sniper Shot from his SCAR and a Tear Gas Grenade that can choke and debuff a foes Damage. He can also use Stealth.
